main event: A person spotted a bright light in the sky over Ridge, New York on May 7, 1966.
interesting points: The witness went outside to check the weather and saw the bright light moving in a straight line.
The witness observed the light for about 25 minutes.
The weather conditions included clear skies on the north shore but hazy conditions to the south, with gusting winds up to 15 knots.
The report mentions that neon signs and searchlights could have appeared as a UFO due to the weather conditions.
The Air Force concluded that there was insufficient data to evaluate the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
